io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter

Class ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.BaseRandom
        • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter.BaseSplittableRandomAdapter
          • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter.ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ByteArrayReseedableRandom, EntropyCountingRandom, RepeatableRandom, Dumpable, Serializable

    public class ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter
extends BaseSplittableRandomAdapter
    A version of SplittableRandomAdapter that uses a RandomSeederThread to replace each seederThread's SplittableRandom with a reseeded one as frequently as possible, but not more frequently than it is being used.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    ubuntu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setSeedInternal

        protected void setSeedInternal(@UnknownInitialization ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter this,
                               byte[] seed)
        Description copied from class: BaseRandom
        Sets the seed, and should be overridden to set other state that derives from the seed. Called by BaseRandom.setSeed(byte[]), whose default implementation ensures that the lock is held while doing so. Also called by constructors, BaseRandom.readObject(ObjectInputStream) and BaseRandom.readObjectNoData().
        Overrides:
        setSeedInternal in class BaseSplittableRandomAdapter
        Parameters:
        seed - The new seed.
